video.title: Sticky Footer: CSS Tutorial (Day 13 of CSS3 in 30 Days)
video.description:
Learn how to make a CSS Sticky Footer!

⭐️Files you need ⭐️
💻Sticky Foote Code: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/qwosotrp05shm28/AAAq729kd8IPUWZPyVlgzJxRa?dl=0

topLevelComment.text: Is this better way than giving footer "fixed" property?

replies.author: Lubomir Herko
replies.text:
Yes, much better since it responds to the length of the content. Once there is scrollbar, footer is not visible until you scroll to bottom of the page. If the content is short (without scrollbar), the footer is still at the bottom of the window. 

If you would use 'fixed' property, the footer would be at the bottom of the window regardless of the length of the content area - always.
